      • addSubjectsToAccountGroup

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @POST(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/policy-groups/{group_id}")
retrofit2.Call<UpdatedResponse> addSubjectsToAccountGroup(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                                                                                              @Path(value="group_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String groupId,
                                                                                                                                                                              @Body
                                                                                                                                                                              SubjectList body)
        Add members to a group. Add users and API keys to groups. **Example:** ``` curl -X POST https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/accounts/{account_id}/policy-groups/{group_id} \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' \\ -H 'content-type: application/json' \\ -d '{\"users\": [\"0162056a9a1586f30242590700000000\",\"0117056a9a1586f30242590700000000\"]}' ```
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID. (required)
        groupId - The ID of the group to update. (required)
        body - A list of users and API keys to add to the group. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<UpdatedResponse>

      • createAccountGroup

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @POST(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/policy-groups")
retrofit2.Call<GroupSummary> createAccountGroup(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                                                                         @Body
                                                                                                                                                         GroupCreationInfo body)
        Create a new group. Create a new group. **Example:** ``` curl -X POST https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/accounts/{account_id}/policy-groups \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' \\ -H 'content-type: application/json' \\ -d '{\"name\": \"MyGroup1\"}' ```
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID. (required)
        body - Details of the group to create. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<GroupSummary>

      • getAllAccountGroups

        @GET(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/policy-groups")
retrofit2.Call<GroupSummaryList> getAllAccountGroups(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                           java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                           @Query(value="limit")
                                                                                                           java.lang.Integer limit,
                                                                                                           @Query(value="after")
                                                                                                           java.lang.String after,
                                                                                                           @Query(value="order")
                                                                                                           java.lang.String order,
                                                                                                           @Query(value="include")
                                                                                                           java.lang.String include,
                                                                                                           @Query(value="name__eq")
                                                                                                           java.lang.String nameEq)
        Get all group information. Retrieve all group information. **Example:** ``` curl -X GET https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/accounts/{account_id}/policy-groups \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID. (required)
        limit - The number of results to return (2-1000). Default 50. (optional, default to 50)
        after - The entity ID to fetch after the given one. (optional)
        order - Record order based on creation time. Acceptable values: ASC, DESC. Default: ASC. (optional, default to ASC)
        include - Comma-separated additional data to return. Currently supported: total_count. (optional)
        nameEq - Filter for group name. (optional)
        Returns:
        Call<GroupSummaryList>

      • getApiKeysOfAccountGroup

        @GET(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/policy-groups/{group_id}/api-keys")
retrofit2.Call<ApiKeyInfoRespList> getApiKeysOfAccountGroup(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                                                      @Path(value="group_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String groupId,
                                                                                                                                      @Query(value="limit")
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.Integer limit,
                                                                                                                                      @Query(value="after")
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String after,
                                                                                                                                      @Query(value="order")
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String order,
                                                                                                                                      @Query(value="include")
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String include)
        Get API keys of a group. List the API keys of the group with details. **Example:** ``` curl -X GET https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/accounts/{account_id}/policy-groups/{group_id}/api-keys \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID. (required)
        groupId - The ID of the group to retrieve API keys for. (required)
        limit - The number of results to return (2-1000). Default 50. (optional, default to 50)
        after - The entity ID to fetch after the given one. (optional)
        order - Record order based on creation time. Acceptable values: ASC, DESC. Default: ASC. (optional, default to ASC)
        include - Comma-separated additional data to return. Currently supported: total_count. (optional)
        Returns:
        Call<ApiKeyInfoRespList>

      • getUsersOfAccountGroup

        @GET(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/policy-groups/{group_id}/users")
retrofit2.Call<UserInfoRespList> getUsersOfAccountGroup(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                                               @Path(value="group_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String groupId,
                                                                                                                               @Query(value="limit")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.Integer limit,
                                                                                                                               @Query(value="after")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String after,
                                                                                                                               @Query(value="order")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String order,
                                                                                                                               @Query(value="include")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String include,
                                                                                                                               @Query(value="status__eq")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String statusEq,
                                                                                                                               @Query(value="status__in")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String statusIn,
                                                                                                                               @Query(value="status__nin")
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String statusNin)
        Get users of a group. List users of the group with details. **Example:** ``` curl -X GET https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/accounts/{account_id}/policy-groups/{group_id}/users \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID. (required)
        groupId - The ID of the group to retrieve users for. (required)
        limit - The number of results to return (2-1000). Default 50. (optional, default to 50)
        after - The entity ID to fetch after the given one. (optional)
        order - Record order based on creation time. Acceptable values: ASC, DESC. Default: ASC. (optional, default to ASC)
        include - Comma-separated additional data to return. Currently supported: total_count. (optional)
        statusEq - An optional filter to retrieve users by status. (optional)
        statusIn - An optional filter to retrieve users with a specified set of statuses. (optional)
        statusNin - An optional filter to exclude users with a specified set of statuses. (optional)
        Returns:
        Call<UserInfoRespList>

      • removeApiKeysFromAccountGroup

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @DELETE(value="v3/accounts/{account_id}/policy-groups/{group_id}/api-keys")
retrofit2.Call<UpdatedResponse> removeApiKeysFromAccountGroup(@Path(value="account_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                                                                                                             @Path(value="group_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String groupId,
                                                                                                                                                                                             @Body
                                                                                                                                                                                             SubjectList body)
        Remove API keys from a group. Remove API keys from groups. **Example:** ``` curl -X DELETE https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/accounts/{account_id}/policy-groups/{group_id}/api-keys \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' \\ -H 'content-type: application/json' \\ -d '{\"apikeys\": [\"0162056a9a1586f30242590700000000\",\"0117056a9a1586f30242590700000000\"]}' ```
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID. (required)
        groupId - The ID of the group to remove API keys from. (required)
        body - A list of API keys to remove from the group. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<UpdatedResponse>
